```{r}
library(readr)
hockey_data_2_ <- read_csv("~/Survey group project/hockey_data (2).csv")
df<-hockey_data_2_
```
```{r}
cont_rating_degree<-function(df){
    df %>% 
    mutate(cont_rating_degree = case_when(
      cont_rating <= 6 ~ "Low",
      cont_rating <= 12 ~"Normal",
      TRUE ~ "High"
    ))
}
```



```{r}
creat_west_column<-function(df){
    df %>% 
    mutate(west_or_east = case_when(
      team == "car"~ "east",
      team=="cbj" ~"east",
      team=="njd"~"east",
      team=="nyi"~"east",
      team=="nyr"~"east",
      team=="phi"~"east",
      team=="pit"~"east",
      team=="wsh"~"east",
      team=="bos"~"east",
      team=="buf"~"east",
      team=="det"~"east",
      team=="fla"~"east",
      team=="mtl"~"east",
      team=="ott"~"east",
      team=="tbl"~"east",
      team=="tor"~"east",
      
      TRUE ~ "west"
    ))
}
hockey_data_west<-creat_west_column(df)

```

```{r}
write.csv(x=hockey_data_west,file="hockey_data_west.csv")

```
